name: Chess -- Lite
description:
Chess is believed to have originated in India, some time before the 7th century. Try our incarnation of this ancient game.

Completely free! This is not a demo, and has no locked options.

Featuring:
- 5 play levels (Beginner to Expert). Uses intelligent weakening for lower levels. Good for beginners.
- Choose between 3 different play modes - Passive, Neutral or Aggressive
- Hints
- Undo
- Design mode
- Automatically save the game
- Designed for both Tablet and Phone.
- Play against a device, person-to-person or watch a device to play against itself.
- Stats.

Don't forget to check our Game section for other fun games....
